subject: Re: help required for junit
msgSnippet: ... I don t know about local resources (try google) but I m sure a variety of us would be willing to go there and hold a class if you were able/willing to pay
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, vijay senthil <ksvijaysenthil@y...> wrote:
> Hi all
> Do anyone of u know where i can get training
> for junit in Bangalore, India.

I don't know about local resources (try google) but I'm sure a variety
of us would be willing to go there and hold a class if you were
able/willing to pay for a course (+expenses).

have you been through all the material online & Kent's book? Read my
previous message to someone else for some links.

Dave
